alert.note: Alert for Arapahoe; Douglas; Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 11:14PM MDT until August 08 at 11:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Douglas County in northeastern Colorado... Northwestern Elbert County in east central Colorado... Southwestern Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 1145 PM MDT. * At 1113 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Parker, or 16 miles southeast of Denver, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter size hail in Parker. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... The Pinery around 1125 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Elizabeth and Ponderosa Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
